cleaned_text: mind. These are very grounding and refreshing essential oil blends with Himalayan Sea Salt and Crystals. *Grounding This earthy and woodsy blend of essential oils.These oils are carefully blended together with pink Himalayan sea salt & Rose Quartz Ingredients: Spring Water, Patchouli, Cedarwood, Lavender, Frankincense, Rosemary, & Peppermint Essential Oils, Pink Himalayan Sea Salt, Rose Quartz, Which Hazel *Uplifting This is a envigorating uplifting blend of essential oils. These oils are carefully blended together with pink Himalayan sea salt & Turquoise Stones. Ingredients: Spring Water, Lemon, Grapefruit, Orange, Lime, Lemongrass, Rosemary, Peppermint, essential oils, Pink Himalayan Sea Salt, Turquoise, Which Hazel. *Clarity This is a earthy and uplifting blend of essential oils. These oils are carefully blended together with pink Himalayan sea salt & Amethyst Stones. Ingredients: Spring Water, Spearmint, Rosemary, Cedarwoord, Lemon, & Eucalyptus essential oils, Pink Himalayan Sea Salt, Amethyst, Which Hazel. Directions: Shake well allowing the Amethyst to mix with the essential oils and Himalayan salt. Use are desired throughout your day. *Not intended to diagnose treat or cure any diseases This comes in a 4oz spray bottle for easy travel and use. 1-3 business days Buyers are responsible for any customs and import taxes that may apply. I'm not responsible for delays due to customs. But please contact me if you have any problems with your order. Apr 2, 2023 Jan 9, 2022 Jun 23, 2021 I ordered all three of the Jamilah's Smudge Aromatherapy Sprays (Grounding, Clarity, and Uplifting), and they are absolutely wonderful. I even added them to my essential oil diffuser and my home smells incredible - the scents are light and not overpowering at all. Thank you so much!
